G

Game - model中的类
The Game class manages the core logic of the Battleship game, including ship placement, hit/miss tracking, and turn-based gameplay.
Game(GameUi) - 类的构造器 model.Game
Constructor for the Game class.
GameUi - view中的类
GameUi is the main user interface class for the Battleship game.
GameUi() - 类的构造器 view.GameUi
Constructor for the GameUi class.
